Corp.) |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:24:9B |chip1 = ASIX;AX88179; |chip2 = E-CON;EG24A027S; |chip3 = |chip4 = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |eth_ports = 1 |eth_speed = 1GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Action Star |manuf_model = IA-HEB2 |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 01/2013 |estprice = 69 |upc = 814556015025 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00BA4JGZ0 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This product is a power-leeching liar: hub reports as self-powered, :yet both hub and NIC are powered by host VBUS. :When auxiliary power supply is used, then downstream ports are :switched to sourcing from DC inlet jack J1. Hardware has capability to detect power supply presence: :J1 has a switch pin, leading to U3 (VLI hub controller pin 47) :and to Q1 (pin 1. Q1 might be a transistor / logic gate. :pin 3 leads to host VBUS (5V), pin 2 leads to ground plane). :When DC barrel plug present, J1 switch is OPEN, pin voltage rises to 4.4V from Q1. :When NO plug present, J1 switch is CLOSED to ground/0V. U8 might act as power switch, connect downstream receptacle :power pins to one of: upstream USB VBUS, or J1. ===Board label=== Board label silkscreen mark: "IA-HEB2-H100", "2012-11-19" (likely design date) :"1428" in seven segment style (likely circuitboard manufacture date 2014 week 28) :MAC address of specimen is 00:24:9b:11:24:e3, :which resembles USB serial number 0000249B1124E3. ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' File:USB3GBIT3X top.JPG|board topside File:USB3GBIT3X bottom.JPG|board bottomside File:USB3GBIT3X halfopen.JPG|board set into place in half case
